title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2849/2000 of 22 December 2000 amending the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 establishig an agricultural product nomenclature for export refunds
header:
Commission Regulation (EC) No 2849/2000
of 22 December 2000
amending the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 establishig an agricultural product nomenclature for export refunds
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 of 17 December 1987 establishing an agricultural product nomenclature for export refunds(1), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 2425/2000(2), and in particular the last paragraph of Article 3,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2759/75 of 29 October 1975 on the common organisation of the market in pigmeat(3), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1365/2000(4), and in particular Article 13(12) thereof,
Whereas:
(1) Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 provides for the publication of the full version of the refund nomenclature valid at 1 January each year in line with the provisions on export arrangements for agricultural products(5).
(2) The amendments to the combined nomenclature introduced by Commission Regulation (EC) No 2388/2000 of 13 October 2000 amending Annex I to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical nomenclature and on the Common Customs Tariff(6) applicable from 1 January 2001 should be taken into consideration.
(3) Furthermore, an additional quality not containing poultrymeat should be included in Sector 6 of Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 for products covered by CN code 1601 00 91, so that refunds can, where applicable, be limited to that type of products if the quantities covered by export licence applications exceed or are likely to exceed the normal quantities.
(4) The measures provided for in this Regulation regarding the amendments to Sector 6 of Annex I are in accordance with the opinion of the Management Committee for Pigmeat,
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3846/87 is hereby replaced by the Annexes hereto.

The Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 2001.
The amendment relating to CN code 1601 00 shall apply to export licence applications submitted from 1 January 2001.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 2000.
For the Commission
Franz Fischler
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 366, 24.12.1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 279, 1.11.2000, p. 14.
(3) OJ L 282, 1.11.1975, p. 1.
(4) OJ L 156, 29.6.2000, p. 5.
(5) The Annex to the Regulation incorporates the amendments adopted in the following:
- Commission Regulation (EC) No 2605/1999 (OJ L 316, 10.12.1999, p. 32),
- Commission Regulation (EC) No 1000/2000 (OJ L 114, 13.5.2000, p. 10),
- Commission Regulation (EC) No 2287/2000 (OJ L 260, 14.10.2000, p. 22),
- Commission Regulation (EC) No 2425/2000.
(6) OJ L 264, 18.10.2000, p. 1.
ANNEX I
AGRICULTURAL PRODUCT NOMENCLATURE FOR EXPORT REFUNDS
CONTENTS
>TABLE>
1. Cereals and wheat or rye flour, groats or meal
>TABLE>
2. Rice and broken rice
>TABLE>
3. Products processed from cereals

4. Cereal-based compound feedingstuffs
>TABLE>
5. Beef and veal
>TABLE>
6. Pigmeat

7. Poultrymeat
>TABLE>
8. Eggs
>TABLE>
9. Milk and milk products

10. Fruits and vegetables

11. Products processed from fruits and vegetables

13. White and raw sugar without further processing

14. Syrups and other sugar products
